nzilbb.vowels 0.2.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Package index

All functions

correlation_test()
Run permutation test on correlations in a dataset.
lobanov_2()
Apply Lobanov 2.0 normalisation
onze_intercepts
Speaker random intercepts for a sample of 100 speakers, as given in supplementary materials for Brand et al. 2021.
onze_intercepts_full
Speaker random intercepts for 418 speakers, as given in supplementary materials for Brand et al. 2021.
onze_vowels
Monophthong data for random sample of speakers from the ONZE corpus.
onze_vowels_full
Monophthong data for speakers from the ONZE corpus.
pca_contrib_plot()
Create plot of variables by contribution to given PC.
pca_test()
Generate bootstrapped confidence intervals and permutation based null distribution for PCA analysis.
permutation_test()
Run permutation test on PCA analysis.
plot_correlation_counts()
Create plot of correlation counts from correlation_test object.
plot_correlation_magnitudes()
Create plot of correlation magnitude from correlation_test object.
plot_loadings()
Create plot of index loadings for a given PC from pca_test object.
plot_pc_input()
Plot Scores from Significant PCs Against PCA Input
plot_permutation_test()
Create plot of results of permutation test.
plot_variance_explained()
Create plot of variances explained from pca_test object
plot_vowel_space()
Plot vowel space for speaker or speakers.
qb_intervals
Mean formant, articulation rate, and amplitude values for intervals generated for QuakeBox monologues. The same 77 speakers as in qb_vowels are used.
qb_vowels
Vowel data for 77 speakers from the QuakeBox corpus, with 11 in each age category.
summary(<correlation_test>)
Summary function for correlation test object. Set alpha to change significance

Developed by Joshua Wilson Black, James Brand.
